Disease.Name: SELENIUM DEFICIENCY
Disease.Summary: Protein energy malnutrition;Disease related malnutrition;Malnutrition is a significant cause of morbidity and mortality in developing countries. It is the direct cause of over 300,000 deaths annually and is indirectly responsible for about half of all deaths in children [;Mueller O et al. 2005;];Keshan disease; (KD) is an endemic cardiomyopathy. The etiology of KD is ;selenium; ;deficiency [;Zhou B et al. 2016]

literature.title: Selenium deficiency associated porcine and human cardiomyopathies
literature.author: Oropeza-Moe M,

literature.title: Selenium deficiency and the effects of supplementation on preterm infants
literature.author: Freitas RG,

literature.title: An original discovery: selenium deficiency and Keshan disease (an endemic heart disease)
literature.author: Chen J
